list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Seventh Commit: - Main Objective: 1.Added UserProfileAndSettingsFragment.kt for the user to view his information (Username & Email), to edit timer of the day as per his preference and a button to logout.
- Secondary changes: 1. Succeeded in making the timer dynamic; for the user to set his own bed time schedule.
Minor Changes: 1. Changed defaults in TasksDataClass.kt. 2. Made some changes in TodoRepo.kt, and renamed it to Repository.kt. 3. In TasksViewFragment.kt: Attempted to fix a user-experience bug wherein the RV refresh and start aat the beginning of the list, tried: adapter notify function, an interface to pass the position, used lambda expression..but nothing worked so far. 4. Made necessary shared preference keys as constants.

task.summary: User Interface: Three Fragments with their View Models + Navigation Component + Bottom Navigation
User Interface: Three Fragments with their View Models + Navigation Component + Bottom Navigation

Fourth Commit: Timer for remaining hours of the day + completed simple basic todolist. In details... - SplashScreen.kt: made and put the shared keys as constants + made the delay dynamic. - MainActivity.kt: removed unneeded shared preference lines of codes + added lines to finish the activity when pressed on "Back Button" when it is pressed in login+signup pages. - ToDoViewModel.kt: made "saveTask" one-lined function. - TasksDataClass.kt: modified and added properties to the task data class. - LoginFragment.kt & SignupFragment.kt: made the shared preference keys dynamic as constants values. - TodoRepo.kt: made "SaveTaskResult" function return a message of operation result.
ToDoFragment.kt + TodoRVListAdapter.kt: Added two timers+header + simple todolist with basic features.
Layouts are changes accordingly.
Added TasksViewFragment.kt to view more informative task cards. also added an icon to share task title in TodoRVListAdapter.kt
